lexUnit.name: deliberation.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the action or process of engaging in long and careful consideration

sentence.text: I have an awful suspicion that morning TV here could soon lurch towards its American counterpart , with deep daily deliberations about you and your psyche/milkman/rocking horse/ puma/postman .
